Name: Generation Streets
About the game: What if we take a real-world map and make all the buildings three-dimensional? And then draw textures on them and add some trees, power lines and other visual garbage? That's what: Load your hometown, find your home and this casual game will start giving you very unexpected impressions. In the free version of the game, only limited territories are available. Warning : although most places have a relatively high level of detail, it's impossible to render objects exactly as they look in the real world due to map inconsistencies or a lack of geodata, especially in rural areas. Do not expect a 100-percent match. Places will look recognizable but no more. Also, some places are just completely missing on the map and will be not rendered.
